statements: SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE travel_preferences->>'destination' = 'Paris';
SELECT user_id, username, past_trips->'destinations' FROM UserProfiles WHERE past_trips @> '[{"year": 2020}]';
SELECT user_id, username FROM UserProfiles WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE travel_preferences ->> 'destinations' = 'Paris';
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE past_trips -> 'year' > 2020;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT user_id, username, travel_preferences FROM user_profiles WHERE travel_preferences IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM trips WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT trip_id, destination, start_date, end_date FROM trips WHERE trip_duration > 7 ORDER BY trip_duration DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT username, age, travel_preferences FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT user_id, destination, start_date, end_date FROM trips WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM travel_preferences WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY preferred_destination ASC;
SELECT user_id, preferred_destination, preferred_season FROM travel_preferences WHERE preferred_season IS NOT NULL AND budget < 5000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, preferred_destination, preferred_season FROM travel_preferences WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY preferred_destination;
SELECT trip_id, user_id, destination, rating FROM past_trips WHERE rating >= 4 AND trip_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT user_id, username, email, age, gender FROM user_profiles JOIN travel_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = travel_preferences.user_id WHERE preferred_destination = 'Beach' AND budget < 5000 ORDER BY age DESC, username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles
SELECT username, email, city FROM user_profiles
SELECT full_name, city, country FROM user_profiles ORDER BY city DESC
SELECT preferred_transport, preferred_season FROM travel_preferences WHERE budget_range > 1000
SELECT trip_id, destination, trip_purpose FROM past_trips WHERE trip_duration > 5
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT full_name, city, country FROM user_profiles WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM past_trips ORDER BY trip_duration DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.destination, t.trip_purpose FROM user_profiles u JOIN past_trips t ON u.user_id = t.user_id JOIN user_reviews r ON t.trip_id = r.trip_id WHERE r.rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT username, age, nationality FROM UserProfiles WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT full_name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE age>30;
SELECT user_id, username, gender FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM TravelPreferences WHERE budget>5000 AND duration<7;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT username, email, age FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT full_name, nationality FROM UserProfiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT username, destination, budget FROM UserProfiles JOIN TravelPreferences ON UserProfiles.user_id = TravelPreferences.user_id;

SELECT UserProfiles.username, PastTrips.destination, PastTrips.start_date FROM UserProfiles JOIN PastTrips ON UserProfiles.user_id = PastTrips.user_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
